original_title: 日本ローカルヒーロー大決戦
overview: The story begins with Takeru Yamato (Yatsurugi) lying on the ground, unconscious, struck down by a force that possesses a little girl. This witch and her four generals go to war against our heroes. A fight that seems unequal at first but the strength of their friendship will prove that nothing can beat them.
title: Japan Local Heroes Great Battle
